sn35.237:1: "Hatthesu, bhikkhave, sati ādānanikkhepanaṁ hoti; pādesu sati abhikkamapaṭikkamo hoti; pabbesu sati samiñjanapasāraṇaṁ hoti; kucchismiṁ sati jighacchā pipāsā hoti.
sn35.237:2: Hatthesu, bhikkhave, asati ādānanikkhepanaṁ na hoti; pādesu asati abhikkamapaṭikkamo na hoti; pabbesu asati samiñjanapasāraṇaṁ na hoti; kucchismiṁ asati jighacchā pipāsā na hoti.
sn35.237:3: Dve samuddā bāḷisiko,khīrarukkhena koṭṭhiko;Kāmabhū udāyī ceva,ādittena ca aṭṭhamaṁ;Hatthapādūpamā dveti,vaggo tena pavuccatīti.
